GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A bystander is requesting help for a suspected ~y~disturbance~w~ involving ~y~2 individuals~w~.
GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: ~p~Locate the subway entrance~w~ and attempt to find the ~y~2 individuals~w~ who have caused a disturbance.

OUTCOME0.NOTIFICATION: ~y~Victim:~w~ Help me Officer, I'm being chased by a madman!

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~r~Suspect:~w~ This is a warning shot, stay back!

OUTCOME3.NOTIFICATION: Their respective identification checks have come back as ~g~all clear~w~. No cause for concern.

OUTCOME4.NOTIFICATION: Press ~y~Y~w~ to move the ped to a quiet place to speak.
~g~Success~w~. The ped is now following you.
Go back to speak to the ~r~suspect~w~.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~y~Victim:~w~ My work is done. Arrest me.
~r~Suspect:~w~ You saw how they came at me officer! That was not my fault.
